column4: does the Mobile Broadband section in Network connections in ubuntu 8.04 work properly?
I have a Huawei E169 that access the australian optus network. I tried to follow http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?s=cd4ade02b6c15e1c41c910c2a8c54385&t=858032 but I'm having issues connecting.
unfortunately I have no idea about 3G cards, however the large #ubuntu-au community will probably have an idea
